revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The horse-hoeing husbandry, or, An essay on the principles of tillage and vegetation : wherein is shewn a method of introducing a sort of vineyard-culture into the c..."
revision.text: Possibly: The horse-hoeing husbandry, or, An essay on the principles of tillage and vegetation : wherein is shewn a method of introducing a sort of vineyard-culture into the corn-fields, in order to increase their product, and diminish the common expence, by the use of instruments described in cuts, by Jethro Tull. (Dublin : Printed by A. Rhames, for R. Gunne, G. Risk, G. Ewing, W. Smith, & Smith and Bruce, Booksellers, 1733.) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/46412517
